org.fit.cssbox.layout
Class BrowserCanvas

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.fit.cssbox.layout.BrowserCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class BrowserCanvas
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This class provides an abstraction of a browser rendering area and the main layout engine interface. Afrer the layout, a document image is created by drawing all the boxes and it is drawn on the component.

Author:
burgetr
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

BrowserCanvas

public BrowserCanvas(org.w3c.dom.Element root,
                     DOMAnalyzer decoder,
                     java.awt.Dimension dim,
                     java.net.URL baseurl)
Creates a new instance of the browser engine.for a document

Parameters:
root - the <body> element of the document to be rendered
decoder - the CSS decoder used to compute the style
dim - the viewport dimensions
baseurl - the document base URL
Method Detail

getRootBox

public BlockBox getRootBox()
After creating the layout, the root box of the document can be accessed through this method.

Returns:
the root box of the rendered document. Normally, it corresponds to the <body> element

getViewport

public Viewport getViewport()
After creating the layout, the viewport box can be accessed through this method.

Returns:
the viewport box. This box provides a container of all the rendered boxes.

createLayout

public void createLayout(java.awt.Dimension dim)
Creates the document layout according to the viewport size. If the size of the resulting page is greater than the specified one (e.g. there is an explicit width or height specified for the resulting page), the viewport size is updated automatically.

Parameters:
dim - the viewport size

paintComponent

public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
Overrides:
paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent

clearCanvas

public void clearCanvas()
Fills the whole canvas with the white background.

redrawBoxes

public void redrawBoxes()
Redraws all the rendered boxes.

getImageGraphics

public java.awt.Graphics getImageGraphics()
Returns:
the graphics context for drawing in the page image
